subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /Andy's evp/trstop.mp3 
  Uploaded by : ourobouros2k2 <ourobouros2k2@...> 
  Description : Country cemetery, 2nd .469 session...I hear loud "STOP!!!" I repeat it, ask if it wan'ts me to stop and then the battery to the recorder instantly dies, killing the recorder. I replaced the batts and it worked fine 

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Andy%27s%20evp/trstop.mp3 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:
http://help.yahoo.com/l/us/yahoo/groups/original/members/web/index.htmlfiles

Regards,

ourobouros2k2 <ourobouros2k2@...>
